St._Charles.Robert F. Hyland Performance Arena: Robert F. Hyland Performance Arena or Hyland Performance Arena is a multi-purpose arena in on the campus of Lindenwood University in Saint Charles, Missouri. The arena opened in 1997 and is home to the Lindenwood Lions men's and women's basketball, women's gymnastics, men's and women's volleyball, and wrestling teams, as well as many of the school's club sports. The facility also includes the athletic department offices.
